characters: Driver of a red car, driver of a blue car, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. Initially, the road is clear with no immediate obstacles. As the vehicle progresses, a black car appears ahead in the same lane. By the end of the segment, a blue car from the right lane cuts into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential hazard.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed initially. As the black car appears ahead, the vehicle starts to decelerate to maintain a safe distance. When the blue car cuts in from the right lane, the vehicle rapidly decelerates to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black car, approximately 20 meters away, moving in the same lane, causing the self-vehicle to decelerate. 2) Right: A blue car, approximately 5 meters away, cutting into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-vehicle to rapidly decelerate.

characters: Driver of a black sedan, Driver of a white sedan, Driver of a blue sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. The traffic is dense, and the vehicle is closely following a black sedan. A white sedan is seen overtaking from the left lane, and a blue sedan is visible in the adjacent right lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while closely following the black sedan ahead. The vehicle is positioned in the middle lane, with a white sedan overtaking from the left lane and a blue sedan maintaining its position in the right lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Left: A white sedan, approximately 3 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 3) Right: A blue sedan, approximately 4 meters away, maintaining its position in the adjacent lane.
